```py
numpy.equal(x1, x2, /, out=None, *, where=True, casting='same_kind', order='K', dtype=None, subok=True[, signature, extobj]) = <ufunc 'equal'>
```

```py
>>> np.equal([0, 1, 3], np.arange(3))
array([ True,  True, False]) 
```

```py
>>> a = np.array([2, 4, 6])
>>> b = np.array([2, 4, 2])
>>> a == b
array([ True,  True, False]) 
```
